name: amigurumi ghost
notes:
this adorable crochet ghost isn’t here to haunt, it’s here to bring a smile wherever it appears! stitched in red heart super saver, this is a fun small project for getting comfortable with a variety of techniques, including single crochet, working in the round, embroidery and assembly. whether you perch it on your desk for a bit of cheer or give it to someone special, it’s just the right amount of creepy-cute to celebrate halloween!

materials
red heart® super saver® (7 oz/198 g; 364 yds /333 m)
contrast a soft white (0316) 1 ball or 70 yds/64 m
contrast b petal pink (0373) 1 ball or 5 yds/4.5 m

measurement
approx 6" [15 cm] tall.
